thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo poses with his Bugatti Veyron
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo poses with his Bugatti Veyron

title: Cristiano Ronaldo poses with his Bugatti Veyron
text:
Cristiano Ronaldo poses with his Bugatti Veyron Getty Images 0 21-Feb-2017 19:10:08 The Portuguese has been spending some quality time with one of his prized possessions and is not afraid to show it to the world 
Cristiano Ronaldo has taken time out from Real Madrid’s title challenge to show off one of his favourite toys, a Bugatti Veyron. 
Man City weigh up goalkeeping options 
The 32-year-old posted a picture of himself on Instagram posing alongside the car which he splashed out on after winning Euro 2016 with Portugal last summer. 
The Bugatti is the world’s fastest road car with a top speed of 268 miles per hour and is believed to cost in the region of £1.7 million. A post shared by Cristiano Ronaldo (@cristiano) on Feb 21, 2017 at 4:48am PST 
This is not the first time Ronaldo has shown off his car which clearly holds a very special place in his affections. Related
